column5: Found this on failblog ... based on this, sometimes I might be drunk without even drinking ... I'm sure there are others on here that's just like me   Note: Image taken from failblog.org    i see some resembrance there 8-) ....

Wow, you're not just trying to make out with that thing, you're doing a reach around.  Nice fish.  Dave Mercer must be drunk all the time, cause he's always kissing his fish!  Wonder how his wife feels about that?
I agree with the sign. Fish should not drink alcohol.  muddler
Anybody else notice how excited that fish is about the kiss? lol
you'd better kiss that carp after that grip
of all the fish to kiss...
